name: ONU Colegial
shortDescription: United Nations simulation for Colégio Antônio Vieira students.
description: One of Brazil's largest United Nations simulations, it is an annual event with more than 200 participants and is organized by the students (and former students) of Colégio Antônio Vieira.

In 2022, I was a member of the team that helped with the organization and logistics of the event. In 2023, I became director of this same team and developed the check-in platform that allowed all participants to be accredited by the staff before the opening ceremony.

name: Ritsu
shortDescription: Discord Bot based on the AnimeMusicQuiz (AMQ) game.
description: A Discord Bot based on the AnimeMusicQuiz (AMQ) game, play using your MAL/Anilist animelist and with different game modes!

Built in 2020 as a toy project with some friends, shutdown and archived in 2021. Grew up to 1,000+ Discord servers. I made a lot of architecture mistakes and also learned a bunch of things while making this.

name: sazztv
shortDescription: Live streaming video platform inspired by Twitch.
description: Live streaming video platform inspired by Twitch. Developed using Golang with the Echo framework for the backend and Sveltekit for the frontend.
The RTMP protocol was used for video streaming, ensuring compatibility with streaming programs like OBS Studio.

name: nazuna
shortDescription: CLI tool to download Twitter videos using the terminal.
description: CLI tool to download Twitter videos using the terminal.
Developed with Rust, using Github Actions to automatically compile the executables for each supported platform (MacOS, Windows and Linux) every time there was a new release.
